ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 187
ygData.msgSnippet: I finally got the Gorge goblin.. The secret seems to be sheer luck. I hunted home 60+ hours.. and finally got it when pulling stuff for other people iin the
ygData.messageBody:
I finally got the Gorge goblin.. The secret seems to be sheer luck.

I hunted home 60+ hours.. and finally got it when pulling stuff for other
people iin the zone..

Only the three Goblins spawn there.. the two 6 minute spawns.. and the
placeholder or alchmist at about 75 minutes. Any of these goblins can be a
lookout to a veteran. I had it explained to me that the alchmist is a 10%
chance of showing on it turn. So it can show up seveal times in a row.. or
take a long time.

Deirdra
